Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.handlingToolbox

Interface HandlingToolbox

All Known Implementing Classes:
AssistantHandlingToolbox, BoardHandlingToolbox, CharacterCardHandlingToolbox, CloudHandlingToolbox, HelpingToolBox, IslandHandlingToolbox
public interface HandlingToolbox
The HandlingToolbox class provides and stores EventHandlers to decorate any objects at run-time. It provides mainly allow and disable command methods. Every command can be enabled and disabled for any number of time. Nothing will happen if the HandlingToolbox doesn't offer any functionality for the input command.

  • Method Details

    • allowCommand

      void allowCommand(CommandEnum command, ClientSender resourceProvider)
      Makes the relative handling resource available for the given command (limited to the toolbox functionalities). Note that the correct use of the handling toolbox requires disabling all no-more-permitted commands before enabling the new ones
      Parameters:
      command - the command for which the toolbox will provide the handling resource if asked
      resourceProvider - the provider on which the toolbox relies

    • disableCommand

      void disableCommand(CommandEnum command)
      Changes the handling resources to make sure the given command isn't allowed
      Parameters:
      command - the command to disable
